document.full_text: rangers and celtic, the top two teams in the scottish premier league standings, played to a scoreless tie in the old firm match in glasgow sunday.
document.title: soccer roundup: amid tension, celtic vs. rangers plays out with no violence, and no goals
lines_and_colors: rangers and celtic, the top two teams in the scottish premier league standings, played to a scoreless tie in the old firm match in glasgow sunday.
